title: Little Johnny Jones
creator_credit: Gary Halvorson, Bill Siegler, Showtime Entertainment and Group W Cable Productions
brief_description: This Goodspeed Opera House production of George M. Cohan’s classic American musical “Little Johnny Jones” is performed on stage in front of a live audience and features such hit songs as “Yankee Doodle Dandy” and “Give my regards to Broadway”. The cast includes Eric Weitz as Johnny Jones and Peter Van Norden as Anthony Anstey, with Lenny Wolpe, Ernie Sabella, Bruce Chew, Jack Bittner, Maureen Brennan, Anna Mcneely, Jane Galloway. Book, music and lyrics by George M. Cohan adapted by Alfred Uhry and stage direction by Gerald Gutierrez.
